breakfast.description: Black coffee + full morning stack (NAC, D3K2, Omega-3 etc)

meal1.description: Chicken omelette (4 whole eggs + ~200 g chicken breast, zero oil)

lunch.description: 350 g grilled salmon + big plate grilled veggies (broccoli, zucchini, peppers – minimal oil)

dinner.description: 2 whole grilled crabs (~330–350 g edible meat) – Indian masala rubbed & grilled, no curry gravy, no butter

zmb.dose: 3 caps MyProtein ZMB6 before bed – locked

training: Deadlift 40 kg + bar (5–6 working sets), Back Squat 10 kg + bar (light technique day after heavy chest yesterday). Volume moderate, form perfect.
notes: Another shredded day – 298 g protein on <25 g carbs. Crabs grilled clean with just masala (no oil bath = still basically zero fat). Weight stable at 86.2 kg fasted. Deadlifts felt strong even on deload weight. Streak unstoppable.
